Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kf.samples.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Controller.ChangeListener
      This is called when change button is clicked with something is selected
      class  Controller.DeleteListener
      To set the function which delete all data in list in Db or File on Delete button
      class  Controller.GetDataListSelectionListener
      This isn't used because this invokes event twice when clicked and released
      class  Controller.ReadListener
      To set the function which show data list in Db or File on Show button
      class  Controller.UpdateListener
      Execute update into Db or File and change data on list This dosen't read the data from db after updating but change data on list directly
      class  Controller.WriteListener
      Add one student data at the bottom line of Db or File
